channel.title: [317] delta based. how to code in "use key" with "chest" and get "ITEMS"
channel.description: can i know how to add chest somewhere and you kill a certain monster for a key and you use on chest and it gives you an item or more then one item? please help.

item.title: [317] delta based. how to code in "use key" with "chest" and get "ITEMS"
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

You ask alot of questions lol. Check tuts im pretty sure the commoner doesnt know how to do that all. To add a chest just add the object but the methods for the key im not sure at all

Read full topic
